      • restoreSnapshot

        Restores the data to match that of the given snapshot.
        Parameters:
        snapshot - The Snapshot source to get the data from.

      • paint

           java.awt.Point position)
        Paints the GameWorld to the screen.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object needed to draw.
        position - Point where to draw the GameWorld.
